data.name: JIRA eXtreme Dark
data.description: Dark Theme for Atlassian JIRA. You can combine this theme with Dark Reader Chrome Extension for better results. Filter: - Bright: -10 - Contrast: -20 - Sepia: NO - Gray Scale: +10 More: - Filter: Dynamic Enjoy it!

data.name: No Eyestraining Coloured Text
data.description: Overrides the custom text colouring in text posts to simply revert to black.

data.name: Unified Font Size for Tumblr Dashboard
data.description: The base code is set to unify all instances of small, sub, super, and doublesmall font sizes to the default font size. This will not affect the line spacing when these fonts are used, but it will allow you to have your dash displayed at your preferred font size.

data.name: WTF Time  EVRL Dark Theme
Sword Art Online | Kirito | Google
deviantArt Eclipse Redesign
data.description: Eclipse Redesign shall not only bring back the feeling of the old deviantart, but also help your orientation by making the general appearance smaller and add more colours as separators.

data.name: |Neumorphism Firefox
Lovepedia CleanDark
Trello - Easy Arabic
data.description:
If you don't use Arabic PLEASE DO NOT install this style, it is useless for you !       
For Trello - Arabic users,  just try it !!

data.name: LMFT4u, Netflix
data.description:
Let me fix that for you, Netflix. This style shows more content on less space. Just continue scrolling to get rows after rows of suggestions.

Removes annoying content, like promo, red annotations, and shades over paused video.

Tested on Mac Firefox.

data.name: Dark Whatsapp Discord Theme
data.description: A dark Whatsapp Web theme based off Discord's theme.
